article.title: U.S. Navy Procures Counter Measure Systems
article.author: George Seffers
article.text: Advanced Engineering & Sciences, Annapolis Junction, Maryland, is being awarded a nearly $31 million contract for the procurement of post-production maintenance support of Navy crew fixed site systems and procurement and support of the transmitting set, counter measure AN/PLT-4 systems.Â The Naval Surface Warfare Center, Indian Head Division, Indian Head, Maryland, is the contracting activity.
